Maryam Saleh (amụrụ n'afọ 1985 ma ọ bụ n'afọ 1986), nke aha zuru ezu ya bụ Maryam Saleh Saad bụ onye na-agụ egwu na onye na-ede egwu (nke gụnyere Psychedelic Rock, Trip-hop) na onye na-eme ihe nkiri.

Nna ya bụ onye na-ede ihe nkiri, onye nduzi ihe nkiri na onye nkatọ Saleh Saad, onye ya na ya rụkọrọ ọrụ dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri na osote onye nduzi mgbe ọ dị obere. Ọ nwụrụ n'ọkụ n'afọ 2005 na Beni Suef
Otu n'ime ndị enyi nna ya bụ Sheikh Imam, onye nwere mmetụta dị ukwuu n'ebe ọ nọ.

Dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri, ọ pụtara na egwuregwu dị iche iche dịka Laila Soliman's Lessons in Revolution, ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi na ihe nkiri Ibrahim El-Batout A Shams (2008), nke ọ bụrụ abụ aha ya.
N'ihe dị ka n'afọ 2008, o guzobere otu egwu ya bụ Jawaz Safar, nke a na-akpọ naanị ngwá egwu Oud na Tabl

N'afọ 2008, o guzobere otu egwu Baraka (Arabic), abụ Sheikh Imam bụ Nixon Baba, Valery Giscard d'Estaing Ya Wad Ya Yu Yu, ya wādd yā yū yū na Ya wāddy yū yō El-Bahr Byidhak Leh "( 'Ihe mere oké osimiri ji chịa') nke nwanne ya nwanyị Nagham Saleh kpuchiri ma mesịa bụrụ.
Kemgbe afọ 2010 ya na onye egwu Lebanọn bụ Zeid Hamdan na-arụkọ ọrụ; a kọwara egwu ahụ dị ka Arab trip-hop.

Maryam Saleh pụtara dị ka nwanyị akwụna Mona Farkha na ihe nkiri mkpirikpi Egypt nke afọ 2011 A Tin Tale (Arabic: حدوتة من صاج, Hadouta Men Sag ; Director: Aida El-Kashef) dị ka akụkụ nke Dubai International Film Festival.
